meanings.sent1: The pourer filled the cup with juice.
meanings.sent2: The waiter is a skilled pourer of wine.
meanings.sent3: The pourer at the party made sure everyone had a drink.
meanings.sent4: She was a pourer of love and kindness to all around her.
meanings.sent5: The pourer's steady hand never spilled a drop.

meanings.definition: A device used for pouring liquids
meanings.sent1: The pourer attached to the bottle helped control the flow of oil.
meanings.sent2: The bartender used a pourer to measure the shots accurately.
meanings.sent3: The pourer on the watering can made watering the plants easier.
meanings.sent4: The pourer on the teapot resembled a tiny spout.
meanings.sent5: The pourer on the fuel can prevented spills during refueling.

meanings.definition: A container with a spout for pouring liquids
meanings.sent1: The glass pitcher with a pourer was perfect for serving lemonade.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new water jug with a convenient pourer for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The pourer on the oil canister made it easy to refill the lamp.
meanings.sent4: The teapot with a fancy pourer was a lovely addition to the tea party.
meanings.sent5: The plastic bottle with a pourer cap was ideal for dispensing shampoo.
